title: Die Sabbathi 13 Novemb. 1647 Whereas by an ordinance of this present Parliament bearing date the fourteenth day of July 1643. It was granted, ordained, and declared, that all those who should advance one full fourth part of their former adventures for lands in Ireland, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: for John Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Baily,
notes: Recites provisions of ordinance 14 July 1643. Adventurers advancing one-fourth of their former adventure should have double the land promised -- Cf. Steele.
At foot of page, in oversized typeface: Printed December the first 1647.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
